name: Bouncing Asteroids
description:
Defend Earth from the approaching threat of asteroids. Manned with a deadly laser, your skills are the last line of defense for the survival of mankind as you maneuver through increasing numbers of extinction inducing pebbles.

CONTROLS:

WASD for movement

Mouse for aiming/firing

Space for a bomb

Made with the Godot Engine

Music Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kIBwWd2_NT8
